method: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and line a cupcake tray with translucent cupcake liners.
In a mixing bowl, cream the crystallized butter and pearlescent sugar until light and fluffy.
Add the transparent eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
Stir in the luminescent vanilla extract.
In a separate bowl, combine the translucent flour and iridescent baking powder.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the butter mixture, alternating with sparkling milk.
Divide the batter evenly among the cupcake liners.
Bake for 15-20 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Let the crystalized cupcakes cool completely before frosting.
Decorate the cupcakes with shimmering frosting and edible glitter for an extra touch of sparkle.
